item.title: clusterProfiler: statistical analysis and visualization of functional profiles for genes and gene clusters
item.description: The clusterProfiler package implements methods to analyze and visualize functional profiles of genomic coordinates (supported by ChIPseeker), gene and gene clusters. clusterProfiler is released within the Bioconductor project and the source code is hosted on GitHub. Author Guangchuang Yu, School of Public Health, The University of Hong Kong. Citation Please cite the following article when using clusterProfiler: Yu G, Wang L, Han Y and He Q*.

item.title: Documentation
item.description: Vignettes DOSE: Disease enrichment analysis DOSE: Disease GSEA Statistical analysis and visualization of functional profiles for genes and gene clusters Blog posts News and updates clusterProfiler in Bioconductor 2.8 clusterProfiler: an R Package for Comparing Biological Themes Among Gene Clusters BioC 3.1: NEWS of my BioC packages BioC 3.2: NEWS of my BioC packages BioC 3.3: NEWS of my BioC packages BioC 3.4: NEWS of my BioC packages ID conversion convert biological ID with KEGG API using clusterProfiler Enrichment analysis GO analysis using clusterProfiler use simplify to remove redundancy of enriched GO terms KEGG Module Enrichment Analysis KEGG enrichment analysis with latest online data using clusterProfiler DAVID functional analysis with clusterProfiler functional enrichment for GTEx paper use clusterProfiler as an universal enrichment analysis tool functional enrichment analysis with NGS data leading edge analysis a formula interface for GeneOntology analysis bioinfoblog.

item.title: Featured Articles
item.description: Let us know if you have published using clusterProfiler and your publication will be featured here. 2018 A Single-Cell Transcriptome Atlas of the Aging Drosophila Brain. Cell. 2018. Whole-genome sequencing reveals genomic signatures associated with the inflammatory microenvironments in Chinese NSCLC patients. Nature Communications. 2018, 9:2054. p38-MK2 signaling axis regulates RNA metabolism after UV-light-induced DNA damage. Nature Communications. 2018, 9:1017. Transcription factor Hoxb5 reprograms B cells into functional T lymphocytes.

item.title: Tweets
item.description: Leave me a message on The R-packages from Guangchuan Yu are so extremely useful - ggtree, clusterProfiler, GOSemSim, DOSE - can we please collect them and call it the Yu-niverse? — Philipp Bayer (@PhilippBayer) February 23, 2018 Really one of the best visualization tools for transcriptomics. clusterProfiler: universal enrichment tool for functional and comparative study https://t.co/6MqE7kWcxW #rnaseq #transcriptomics pic.twitter.com/gYtEMhWuU0 — James Marsh (@tothejim) February 1, 2018 clusterProfiler: #Rpackage what I exactly needed for statistical functional profiling of gene clusters https://t.
